packageActivityPlugin.pluginProperties:
{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"INSERT INTO app_fd_flow_stock (id,c_id_req_item_keluar, c_namaProduk, c_gudang)
SELECT id, c_id_req_item_keluar, c_nama_sku as c_namaProduk, c_gudang
FROM app_fd_item_keluar a
WHERE a.c_id_req_item_keluar = '#process.recordId#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"update app_fd_sku_master
set c_total = '0',
c_gudang_produksi = '0',
c_gudang_packing = '0'
WHERE id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a
INNER JOIN app_fd_pre_form b
ON a.c_nama_pre_form = b.c_nama_pre_form
SET 
a.c_qty_sebelum = b.c_total_pre_form,
b.c_total_pre_form = a.c_kuantitas,
a.c_qty_balance =a.c_kuantitas
WHERE 
 a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a 
 INNER JOIN app_fd_keluar_barang b 
 on a.c_id_req_item_keluar=b.id 
SET 
a.dateCreated = b.dateCreated,
a.dateModified = b.dateModified,
a.createdBy = b.createdBy,
a.createdByName = b.createdByName,
a.modifiedBy = b.modifiedBy,
a.modifiedByName = b.modifiedByName,
a.c_alur = 'Keluar',
a.c_id_flow = b.c_id_barang_keluar,
a.c_tanggal = b.c_tanggal_keluar
WHERE b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.tutorial.PurchaseRequestWSAppScript","properties":{"url":"https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbw4pXN127J0kRqjY5iQKTwBntaKJqmg8jThjgr6Y8Fivyb_9NkHF-rrtTYFw-h9vzW8pA/exec","parentId":"#process.recordId#"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a 
 INNER JOIN app_fd_pre_form b 
 on a.c_nama_pre_form = b.c_nama_pre_form
SET 
a.c_qty_sebelum = CAST(b.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED)
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform
SET 
c_alur = 'keluar'
WHERE id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a
INNER JOIN app_fd_produksi b 
ON a.id = b.id
SET 
a.c_qty_count = CAST(b.c_aktual_cacat_produksi AS SIGNED) - CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_sesudah = CAST(a.c_qty_count AS SIGNED) + CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_cacat = CAST(b.c_aktual_cacat_produksi AS SIGNED)
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a
INNER JOIN app_fd_masuk_gudang b 
ON a.id = b.id
SET a.c_kuantitas = CAST(a.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) + CAST(b.c_jumlah_barang_aktual AS SIGNED)
WHERE b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a
INNER JOIN app_fd_sku_master b
ON a.c_skuProduk = b.id
SET 
a.c_namaProduk = b.c_namaProduk,
a.c_qty_sebelum = b.c_total
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a
SET 
a.c_qty_count_mst = CAST(a.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) - CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah_mst AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_sesudah_mst = CAST(a.c_qty_count_mst AS SIGNED) + CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah_mst AS SIGNED)
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a
INNER JOIN app_fd_sku_master b
ON a.c_skuProduk = b.id
SET 
a.c_namaProduk = b.c_namaProduk,
a.c_qty_sebelum = b.c_total
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a 
 INNER JOIN app_fd_produksi b 
 on a.id=b.id
SET 
a.dateCreated = b.dateCreated,
a.dateModified = b.dateModified,
a.createdBy = b.createdBy,
a.createdByName = b.createdByName,
a.modifiedBy = b.modifiedBy,
a.modifiedByName = b.modifiedByName,
a.c_alur = 'Masuk',
a.c_skuProduk = b.c_nama_produk,
a.c_tanggal = b.c_tanggal_produksi, 
a.c_id_flow = b.c_id_produksi_botol
WHERE b.id = '#process.recordId#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"rules":{"ifrules":[{"andOr":"and","revert":false,"conditions":[{"variable":"pickUp","revert":false,"operation":"==","value":"jadi"}],"actions":[{"name":"transition17","type":"transition","value":""}]}],"else":[{"name":"transition14","type":"transition","value":""}]}}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a
INNER JOIN app_fd_audit_preform b
on a.id = b.id 
set 
a.c_kuantitas = b.c_jumlah_preform_aktual
where a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"rules":{"ifrules":[{"andOr":"and","revert":false,"conditions":[{"variable":"pickUp","revert":false,"operation":"==","value":"jadi"}],"actions":[{"name":"transition17","type":"transition","value":""}]}],"else":[{"name":"transition14","type":"transition","value":""}]}}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"INSERT INTO app_fd_flow_stock 
(
id,
dateCreated,
dateModified,
createdBy,
createdByName,
modifiedBy,
modifiedByName,
c_id_flow,
c_tanggal,
c_gudang,
c_skuProduk,
c_namaProduk,
c_kuantitas
)
SELECT 
id,
dateCreated,
dateModified,
createdBy,
createdByName,
modifiedBy,
modifiedByName,
c_id_pindah_barang as c_id_flow,
c_tanggal,
c_ke_gudang as c_gudang,
c_input_manual as c_skuProduk,
c_nama_sku as c_namaProduk,
c_total_item_pindah as c_kuantitas
FROM app_fd_item_pindah a
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_pre_form a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_preform b 
ON a.c_nama_pre_form = b.c_nama_pre_form
SET 
 b.c_qty_sebelum = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED),
 a.c_total_pre_form = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED) - CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED),
 b.c_qty_balance = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED) - CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED)
WHERE 
 b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a
INNER JOIN app_fd_sku_master b
ON a.c_namaProduk = b.c_namaProduk
SET a.c_skuProduk = b.id,
a.c_qty_sebelum = b.c_total
WHERE a.c_id_req_item_keluar = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"rules":{"ifrules":[{"andOr":"and","revert":false,"conditions":[{"variable":"status","revert":false,"operation":"==","value":"approve"}],"actions":[{"name":"transition7","type":"transition","value":""}]}],"else":[{"name":"transition9","type":"transition","value":""}]}}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a 
INNER JOIN app_fd_preform_keluar b 
on a.id=b.id
set 
a.c_kuantitas = CAST(b.c_jumlah_barang AS SIGNED)
WHERE b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"insert into app_fd_flow_preform (id,c_qty_sesudah,c_qty_produksi,c_kuantitas,c_qty_sesudah_mst)\r\nvalues ('#process.recordId#','0','0','0','0') ;","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a
INNER JOIN app_fd_pre_form b
ON a.c_nama_pre_form = b.c_nama_pre_form
SET 
a.c_qty_sebelum = b.c_total_pre_form,
a.c_alur = 'audit'
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_sku_master a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_stock b 
ON a.id = b.c_skuProduk
SET 
 a.c_total = b.c_kuantitas,
 b.c_qty_balance = b.c_kuantitas 
WHERE 
 b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"rules":{"ifrules":[{"andOr":"and","revert":false,"conditions":[{"variable":"status","revert":false,"operation":"==","value":"approve"}],"actions":[{"name":"transition7","type":"transition","value":""}]}],"else":[{"name":"transition9","type":"transition","value":""}]}}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_pre_form a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_preform b
on a.c_nama_pre_form = b.c_nama_pre_form
set 
b.c_qty_sebelum = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED),
a.c_total_pre_form = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED) + CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED),
b.c_qty_balance = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED) + CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED)
WHERE b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"INSERT INTO app_fd_flow_preform 
(
id,
dateCreated,
dateModified,
createdBy,
createdByName,
modifiedBy,
modifiedByName,
c_nama_pre_form,
c_id_flow,
c_tanggal
)
SELECT 
id,
dateCreated,
dateModified,
createdBy,
createdByName,
modifiedBy,
modifiedByName,
c_nama_pre_form ,
c_id_audit_preform as c_id_flow,
c_tanggal_audit as c_tanggal
FROM app_fd_audit_preform a
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_sku_master a
INNER JOIN app_fd_audit_sku_balance b 
ON a.id = b.c_namaProduk
SET 
 a.c_gudang_produksi = CAST(b.c_gudang_produksi AS SIGNED),
 a.c_gudang_packing = CAST(b.c_gudang_packing AS SIGNED) 
WHERE 
 b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_produksi a

ON a.c_nama_produk = b.id
SET 
a.c_nama_sku = b.c_namaProduk
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a 
 INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_stock b 
 on a.id=b.id
SET 
a.dateCreated = b.dateCreated,
a.dateModified = b.dateModified,
a.createdBy = b.createdBy,
a.createdByName = b.createdByName,
a.modifiedBy = b.modifiedBy,
a.modifiedByName = b.modifiedByName,
a.c_alur = 'produksi',
a.c_tanggal = b.c_tanggal, 
a.c_id_flow = b.c_id_flow,
a.c_namaProduk = b.c_namaProduk
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_sku_master a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_stock b 
ON a.id = b.c_skuProduk
SET 
 b.c_qty_balance = a.c_total
WHERE 
 b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_keluar_barang kel
JOIN (
 SELECT 
 kel.id AS keluar_id,
 JSON_ARRAYAGG(
 JSON_OBJECT(
 'c_nama_sku', item.c_nama_sku,
 'c_request_packing', item.c_request_packing,
 'c_gudang', item.c_gudang
 )
 ) AS json_result
 FROM app_fd_keluar_barang kel
 JOIN app_fd_flow_stock stock ON stock.c_id_flow = kel.c_id_barang_keluar
 JOIN app_fd_item_keluar item ON item.c_id_req_item_keluar = kel.id 
 AND item.c_input_manual = stock.c_skuProduk
 WHERE kel.id = '#process.recordId#'
 GROUP BY kel.id
) subquery ON kel.id = subquery.keluar_id
SET kel.c_item_keluar_json = subquery.json_result;","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a
INNER JOIN app_fd_produksi b 
ON a.id = b.id
SET 
a.c_qty_count = CAST(b.c_aktual_cacat_produksi AS SIGNED) - CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_sesudah = CAST(a.c_qty_count AS SIGNED) + CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_cacat = CAST(b.c_aktual_cacat_produksi AS SIGNED)
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"rules":{"ifrules":[{"andOr":"and","revert":false,"conditions":[{"variable":"approveAktual","revert":false,"operation":"==","value":"Achieve"}],"actions":[{"name":"transition4","type":"transition","value":""}]}],"else":[{"name":"transition9","type":"transition","value":""}]}}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_sku_master a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_stock b ON a.id = b.c_skuProduk
SET 
 b.c_qty_sebelum = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED),
 a.c_total = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED) ,
 b.c_qty_balance = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED) ,
 a.c_gudang_packing = CAST(a.c_gudang_produksi AS SIGNED) + CASE WHEN b.c_gudang = 'gudang_produksi' THEN CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) ELSE 0 END,
WHERE 
 b.c_id_req_item_keluar = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.tutorial.PurchaseRequestWSAppScript","properties":{"url":"https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbw4pXN127J0kRqjY5iQKTwBntaKJqmg8jThjgr6Y8Fivyb_9NkHF-rrtTYFw-h9vzW8pA/exec","parentId":"#process.recordId#"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.tutorial.PurchaseRequestWSAppScript","properties":{"url":"https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbw4pXN127J0kRqjY5iQKTwBntaKJqmg8jThjgr6Y8Fivyb_9NkHF-rrtTYFw-h9vzW8pA/exec","parentId":"#process.recordId#"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_sku_master a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_stock b
on a.id = b.c_skuProduk
set 
b.c_qty_sebelum = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED),
a.c_total = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED) + CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED),
b.c_qty_balance = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED) + CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED),
a.c_gudang_produksi = CAST(a.c_gudang_produksi AS SIGNED) + CASE WHEN b.c_gudang = 'gudang_produksi' THEN CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) ELSE 0 END,
a.c_gudang_packing = CAST(a.c_gudang_packing AS SIGNED) + CASE WHEN b.c_gudang = 'gudang_packing' THEN CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) ELSE 0 END
WHERE b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock
set
c_alur = 'pindah'
WHERE id = '#process.recordId#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_pre_form a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_preform b
on a.c_nama_pre_form = b.c_nama_pre_form
set 
b.c_qty_sebelum = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED),
a.c_total_pre_form = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED) - CAST(b.c_qty_count_mst AS SIGNED),
b.c_qty_balance = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED) - CAST(b.c_qty_count_mst AS SIGNED)
WHERE b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a 
INNER JOIN app_fd_item_keluar b 
on a.c_id_req_item_keluar=b.c_id_req_item_keluar and a.c_skuProduk = b.c_input_manual
set 
a.c_kuantitas = CAST(b.c_request_packing AS SIGNED)
WHERE b.c_id_req_item_keluar = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a 
 INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_stock b 
 on a.id=b.id
SET 
a.c_qty_produksi = CAST(a.c_qty_produksi AS SIGNED) + CAST(b.c_qty_count AS SIGNED),
a.c_kuantitas = CAST(a.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) + CAST(a.c_qty_count AS SIGNED) + CAST(b.c_qty_count AS SIGNED)
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a
INNER JOIN app_fd_produksi b 
ON a.id = b.id
SET 
a.c_kuantitas = CAST(b.c_totalAktual AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_count = CAST(a.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) - CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_sesudah = CAST(a.c_qty_count AS SIGNED) + CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah AS SIGNED)
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

WHERE

 INNER JOIN app_fd_produksi b 
 on a.id=b.id
SET

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_stock a
INNER JOIN app_fd_produksi b 
ON a.id = b.id
SET 
a.c_kuantitas = CAST(b.c_totalAktual AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_count = CAST(a.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) - CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah AS SIGNED),
a.c_qty_sesudah = CAST(a.c_qty_count AS SIGNED) + CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah AS SIGNED)
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_flow_preform a
INNER JOIN app_fd_pre_form b
ON a.c_nama_pre_form = b.c_nama_pre_form
SET 
a.c_qty_sebelum = b.c_total_pre_form
WHERE a.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

a.c_qty_sesudah_mst = CAST(a.c_qty_count_mst AS SIGNED) + CAST(a.c_qty_sesudah_mst AS SIGNED)

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"INSERT INTO app_fd_flow_preform 
(id,
dateCreated,
dateModified,
createdBy,

)

modifiedBy,

c_id_preform_masuk as c_id_flow,

b.c_qty_balance = CAST(a.c_total_pre_form AS SIGNED) - CAST(b.c_qty_count_mst AS SIGNED)

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_sku_master a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_stock b ON a.id = b.c_skuProduk
SET 
 b.c_qty_sebelum = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED),
 a.c_total = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED) - CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED),
 b.c_qty_balance = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED) - CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED),
 a.c_gudang_produksi = CAST(a.c_gudang_produksi AS SIGNED) - CASE WHEN b.c_gudang = 'gudang_produksi' THEN CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) ELSE 0 END,
 a.c_gudang_packing = CAST(a.c_gudang_packing AS SIGNED) - CASE WHEN b.c_gudang = 'gudang_packing' THEN CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED) ELSE 0 END
WHERE 
 b.c_id_req_item_keluar = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_sku_master a
INNER JOIN app_fd_flow_stock b 
ON a.id = b.c_skuProduk
SET 
 b.c_qty_sebelum = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED),
 a.c_total = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED),
 b.c_qty_balance = CAST(a.c_total AS SIGNED),
 a.c_gudang_produksi = CAST(a.c_gudang_produksi AS SIGNED) + CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED),
 a.c_gudang_packing = CAST(a.c_gudang_packing AS SIGNED) - CAST(b.c_kuantitas AS SIGNED)
WHERE 
 b.id = '#process.recordId#';","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}
